text: Deng Shu (Chinese: 邓澍; 1929 – 20 January 2023) was a Chinese oil painter. She painted many works for the Communist Party of China. Both Deng Shu and her husband Hou Yimin participated in the design of the RMB. She was professor of the Mural Painting Department at the Central Academy of Fine Arts.邓澍, Encyclopedia of China Her husband Hou Yimin died on 1 January 2023. Deng died later the same month in Changping District on 20 January 2023, at the age of 93.中央美術學院教授夫婦去世 均參與設計人民幣, Epoch Times ==References== Category:20th-century Chinese painters Category:Chinese academics Category:1929 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Place of death missing Category:21st-century Chinese painters
title: Deng Shu
